question: Which one was the theme of the World Toilet Day 2019?
explanation: World Toilet Day (WTD) is an official United Nations international observance day on 19 November to inspire action to tackle the global sanitation crisis. UN-Water is the official convener of World Toilet Day. UN-Water maintains the official World Toilet Day website and chooses a special theme for each year. In 2019 the theme is \'Leaving no one behind\', which is the central theme of the Sustainable Development Goals.
